short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets Laserfiche Web Access support Laserfiche Scanning and Office Integration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension lets Laserfiche Web Access detect if any of its plugins have been installed, like Laserfiche Scanning or Office Integration, and supports expanded Office Integration features. You must be using Web Access for this to offer any functionality.
